description: Represent an scheduled appointment for the operator

type.description: Property. The type of the entity (InventoryItem).

genericKey1.description: Property. The first generic key for the appointment.

genericKey2.description: Property. The second generic key for the appointment.

from.description: Property. The start date and time of the appointment.

to.description: Property. The end date and time of the appointment.

wholeDay.description: Property. Indicates if the appointment is a whole day event.

recurring.description: Property. Indicates if the appointment is recurring.

recurringRule.description: Property. The recurring rule for the appointment.

recurringException.description: Property. The recurring exception for the appointment.

note.description: Property. Additional notes for the appointment.

category.description: Property. The category of the appointment.

flag.description: Property. The flag for the appointment.

appointmentDescription.description: Property. The description of the appointment.
